review.title: “Decent Company”
review.pros: Pros – Works in multiple domains. Fast growing company, so you learn a lot.
review.cons: Cons – Premises are a bit cramped.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep up the good work.

review.title: “Process oriented Organization with good leadership”
review.pros: Pros – work culture, location, friendly, good
review.cons: Cons – Very good for freshers and middle management too
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Try for global expansion, offices in other cities too

review.title: “good place to work if you can work independently”
review.pros: Pros – close knit team, fun place to work
review.cons: Cons – felt lack of strong leadership
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – involve and be involved

review.title: “Good company to start your career”
review.pros: Pros – Balanced management.Very good exposure to latest technologies.
review.cons: Cons – Company growth is stagnent.Works only on medium level projects.You don't get a chance to work on large scale.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Should try to retain clients to keep ongoing business.

review.title: “OK”

review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need better management
